summary: Stalhrimhide is an armorspell, which is pretty stronger than the Ebonyflesh-spell.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim Mod: Stalhrimhide - Spell [ENG] 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
IMPORTANT - Dragonborn, Hearthfire and Dawnguard are required

1. What changes inculdes this mod? 
Stalhrimhide is an armorspell, which is pretty stronger than the Ebonyflesh-spell. 

2. Where can i find the Spell Tome? (Pictures above) 

2.1. Go to "Tel Mithryn" in Solstheim and enter the Big tower. 
2.2. Use the Arcane Elevator and go to the Arcane Enchanter, on the Enchanter you find the Spell Tome =) 

3. Bugs and Tips 

This is my first English modification for Skyrim, i hope u don't find any bugs (:'>). If you find some Bugs, or have some Tips for me, pls send me a message in Steam (elevencore), send me a msg or write it in the Comments =) 


Have fun :D
author: Elevencore
